item.title: Designing Data-Intensive Applications: Review
item.author: blog@joaojunior.org (Joao Junior)
item.description: Disclaimer: Don’t read this review, go ahead and read the book, it will be much better for you. The only reason that I wrote this is for my future reference. First of all, I love to read books and I do not believe that a review should influence someone to read or not a book. However, as a researcher, one of the most important things that I learned during my years at the university was the importance to write a review of papers.
